seo.title: Hey! This is Yang
seo.description: Hey! This is Yang. A passion driven software developer at Fabric. I have extensive knowledge and project experience of web development. I am confident with React, Typescript, SQL, Web Performance and Optimization, UI/UX, and RESTful API designs. Beside my academic and career, I am a competitive powerlifter competed at Provincial Champion. I am also a huge fan of Japanese Otaku. My favorite animation is Haikyuu series.

seo.title: Portfolio | Projects
seo.description: During my academic career at BCIT, I built a lot of projects including dynamic web applications and web crawler for data analysis. I started with basic HTML, CSS for static site. Later down the road, I learned JS and SQL and built some interactive web applications such as chat room and twitter clone. Afterwards, I spent most of my time on React philosophy, Design Pattern and Web Performance & Optimization. What I learned is that reading doc or watching video alone will never improve your coding skills, and you will always face new challenges during the development.

seo.title: Journey | Blogs
seo.description: Some tips and tricks for web development, including: React, Typescript, Styled-Components, Next.js, CSS3, HTML, Testing... and more. I also post some algorithm articles to summary some common solving patterns.

seo.title: Portfolio | Videos
seo.description: An amateur video maker. Most of my works are Anime Music Video and Motion Graphics. My tools are Adobe PR and After Effects.
